EmailTemplate.subject: October 2016 Honeywell Channel Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | October Channel Newsletter LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2016/october/honeywell-brings-high-speed-wi-fi-to-falcon-7x-operators]]> HONEYWELL CERTIFIES LCD DISPLAYS LCD Display Trade-in Program The current certifications allow Dornier 328, Learjet 40 and 45 and Embraer Legacy 600 business jet operators to upgrade their traditional displays with Honeywell’s newest technology, enabling access to the latest safety and efficiency cockpit technologies through simple software upgrades.
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2016/october/honeywell-liquid-crystal-displays-certified-to-modernize-legacy-flight-decks]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/blogs/2016/october/six-reasons-to-visit-nbaa-this-year]]>
HONEYWELL AT NBAA NBAA Booth #2200 In just a few short days, NBAA kicks off with several events, announcements and much more taking place. Make sure to stop by our booth to see our featured solutions and speak with our product experts. Read more about our solutions and the 6 reasons we think operators should attend NBAA this year.
FLIGHTSTAR ADS-B AND 20BR ENGINE UPGRADE Upgrade for ADS-B, Engine and Service for Learjet Operators The 20 BR mod—an upgrade of the Honeywell TFE731-20 AR—supercharges Learjet performance, allowing aircraft to fly into higher-altitude airports, take off in higher temperatures, climb to cruising altitude nearly 40 percent faster and faster high-speed cruise at any given altitude.
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2016/october/flightstar-delivers-all-in-one-upgrade-for-ads-b-engine-and-service-for-learjet-operators]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2016/october/new-honeywell-router-technologies-maximize-in-flight-connectivity-for-business-jets]]>
Honeywell's New CNX-900 Router Maximize In-Flight Connectivity for Business Jets Honeywell is maximizing in-flight connectivity capabilities for business jet operators and passengers with its new CNX-900 Cabin Network Router and software upgrade for the widely installed CNX-200 Cabin Network Router..
© 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero/]]> <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> This message was sent to name@website.com.
